properties.name: STAGE_LEFT_WIDTH
properties.comment: NOTE: This is also in oneHelper.js for JavaScript, if you change this, change that.

properties.name: SLIDE_DURATION
properties.comment: NOTE: This is also in oneHelper.js for JavaScript, if you change this, change that.

properties.name: COLOR_WHITE
properties.comment: global use, card bgd, input default bgd, text-color-5, modal action header, secondary btn, bg-1 class, all lists

properties.name: COLOR_BLACK_ALPHA_07
properties.comment: modal action header btn's

properties.name: COLOR_BLACK_ALPHA_16
properties.comment: primary and secondary header btn's, object home search bgd, modal action header btn active state

properties.name: COLOR_BLACK_ALPHA_24
properties.comment: modal action header btn's

properties.name: COLOR_PORCELAIN
properties.comment: bg-3 class, border--3 class used only on white (card, lists, etc.)

properties.name: COLOR_PALE_ROYAL_BLUE
properties.comment: App bgd, bg-2 class

properties.name: COLOR_GEYSER
properties.comment: border--2 class used only between gray and white, disabled input bgd, anchor subtitle color, text-color-7 class, secondary btn and radio/checkbox borders

properties.name: COLOR_CASPER
properties.comment: text-color-3 class, inactive indicator dots bgd, all icons in inputs

properties.name: COLOR_REGENT_GRAY
properties.comment: Action icons

properties.name: COLOR_SLATE_GRAY
properties.comment: Secondary header bgd (child browser, file preview, etc.), input placeholder text

properties.name: COLOR_NEVADA
properties.comment: text-color-2 class, modal action title and modal action btn text color

properties.name: COLOR_BLUE_BAYOUX
properties.comment: text-color-4 class, secondary btn text, input disabled text

properties.name: COLOR_GRAY_ROYAL_BLUE
properties.comment: Anchor bgd, stage left list items, bg-4 class, border--6 class

properties.name: COLOR_DARK_GRAY_ROYAL_BLUE
properties.comment: Input typed text, org switcher top bgd, bg-5 class

properties.name: COLOR_PICKLED_BLUEWOOD
properties.comment: Org switcher drop arrow bgd, bg-20 class

properties.name: COLOR_CAPE_COD
properties.comment: text-color-1 class

properties.name: COLOR_FOAM
properties.comment: New notification background

properties.name: COLOR_CURIOUS_BLUE
properties.comment: S1 primary blue, primary header, primary btn, do not use this for link text

properties.name: COLOR_LOCHMARA
properties.comment: Primary btn active bgd

properties.name: COLOR_DEEP_CERULEAN
properties.comment: All text links (508c)

properties.name: COLOR_WARNING
properties.comment: Alert icon

properties.name: COLOR_INPUT_ERROR_BGD
properties.comment: input error bgd

properties.name: COLOR_ERROR
properties.comment: Notifications badge background

properties.name: COLOR_INPUT_ERROR
properties.comment: input placeholder error text (508c)
